article.headline: Longwood 69, Hampton 66
article.story: HAMPTON, Va. (AP) -- Clayton Morgan had 20 points and 10 rebounds as Longwood held on for a 69-66 win over Hampton on Monday night. Maurice Sumter added 19 for the Lancers (9-19), and Brandon Giles had 13 points. Hampton (11-13) pulled even three times, but Longwood never trailed. The Lancers led 37-26 at halftime. Hampton controlled the boards, outrebounding the Lancers 47-39 and outscoring Longwood 23-8 in second-chance points. Hampton's bench also outscored Longwood's 23-9, led by 19 points from Rashad West. Jeff Granger added 16. The win ended a 38-game road losing streak by the Lancers dating back to Nov. 25, 2003.
